overview: Everyone has needs. Every person desires. Some are up front for all to see. But the lust that simmers underneath threatening to bubble over and the cries of passion unfulfilled remain locked up, yearning to be set free by powers so strong we must consent to unconditional surrender. Let yourself go. Set your passions free. Give in to most primal of needs, surrender now to the sexual seduction.
title: Playgirl: Surrender To Lust
